short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: always check the 'remember me' box when entering credentials.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This attempts to always check the box that says "remeber me", "remember device", etc.

Release Notes:
1.0.3 - Update to manifest V3
1.0.2 - Add support for detecting turbolinks login pages
